benchmark_details.name: PRIME: A Dataset for Long-Context Personalization
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a new dataset derived from the Change My View (CMV) Reddit forum, designed to evaluate long-context personalization in large language models (LLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation benchmark for assessing personalization capabilities in large language models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The introduced benchmark cannot comprehensively represent the entire spectrum of personalization tasks.

data.annotation: Automatically generated from historical engagement data

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ranking of responses to original posts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better personalization and alignment with user preferences.
methodology.baseline_results: The baseline performance is compared against existing models to validate the effectiveness of the PRIME framework.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments validated the dataset across multiple model architectures.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The benchmark analyzes personalization across user backgrounds.
harm: Potential exacerbation of biases in personalization
Data misuse if user histories are improperly managed

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User data is anonymized to protect privacy.
